scripts.dev:prepare: turbo run build --scope=bot-engine --no-deps --include-dependencies && turbo run build --scope=typebot-js --no-deps
scripts.dev: yarn docker:up && yarn dev:prepare && NEXT_PUBLIC_E2E_TEST=false turbo run dx --parallel
scripts.dev:mocking: yarn docker:up && NEXT_PUBLIC_E2E_TEST=enabled turbo run dx --parallel
scripts.build:builder: cp apps/builder/.env.docker apps/builder/.env.production && ENVSH_ENV=./apps/builder/.env.production ENVSH_OUTPUT=./apps/builder/public/__env.js bash env.sh yarn turbo run build --scope=builder --include-dependencies
scripts.build:viewer: cp apps/viewer/.env.docker apps/viewer/.env.production && ENVSH_ENV=./apps/viewer/.env.production ENVSH_OUTPUT=./apps/viewer/public/__env.js bash env.sh yarn turbo run build --scope=viewer --include-dependencies
